title: Test Harness called mladmin abort during test flex-rep-binary-other-user.xml on 5.0
description:
During test flex-rep-binary-other-user.xml, test harness called mladmin abort. The 2 pstack's just before abort with gap of 30 seconds is attached. 
The trace just after abort is given below:


Machine: rh6-intel64-43-test-2.marklogic.com 	
Test-case causing Errors :-	flex-rep-binary-other-user.xml
crash type :-	sigabrt
Thread causing crash :- 	
--------------------------------------------------------------------	
No stack trace found for this crash	
--------------------------------------------------------------------

changeHistory.comment:
Haitao,
Do you see anything obviously wrong around the pstack:
Thread 13 (Thread 0x7fda7187e710 (LWP 25297)):
#0 0x0000000002694b88 in xdmp::StandManager::save(xdmp::Forest&, bool, xdmp::RecoveryToken&, bool&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&, unsigned long&) ()
#1 0x0000000001cdbcb0 in xdmp::Forest::_checkpoint(bool, xdmp::RecoveryToken&) ()
#2 0x0000000001cdcf89 in xdmp::Forest::checkpoint(bool, xdmp::RecoveryToken const&) ()
#3 0x0000000001cdf90a in xdmp::CheckpointTask::run() () 

Also see if you can duplicate the problem by running the test case flex-rep-binary-other-user.xml.  If you cannot duplicate this bug, then we may push it to 5.0-6.
The stack looks fine. I'll try to reproduce this on my box.
I ran the test 3 times on my box and they all passed. I used the latest 5.0 codes and did fresh installs for each test run.

Hi Raghu,
I pushed this bug to 5.0-6 as Haitao cannot duplicate the problem.  You may check to see if there is any change to QA test harness to cause this.

Similar abort appeared in test bug5091.xml on 02/11 nightly regression.
https://regression-status.marklogic.com/space2/diff-archive/b5_0/2013-02-11/linux-64-rh6/qa-criticalErrors.Split2.html
